UNIQUE_RANDOM_SELECT_METHOD_RATIO

This variable is used in StageWordBank. There are two methods for uniquely-random-select words. One for less stage words, and another for more stage words.

This variable controls what the so-called "less and more" means.

Declaration
public const int UNIQUE_RANDOM_SELECT_METHOD_RATIO = 25
Field Value
Type Description
System.Int32
